vocabularies.example:
Representatives for all the main candidates are trying to mobilize voter support.
2-The government has mobilized several of the army's top combat units.
The city was growing but the volume of meat handled in the abattoir was declining.
The abbey was to achieve a much clearer victory in 1120.
King Edward VIII abdicated (the British throne) in 1936.
In a moment of aberration, she agreed to go with him.

vocabularies.tr: Kışkırtmak (yasal olmayan veya kötü bir şeye)
vocabularies.example: His accountant had aided and abetted him in the fraud.
